pizzaorderingsystemnetbeans

Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizzaorderingsystemnetbeans.Pizza
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlavouredPizza

    public class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a single pizza.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pizza

        public Pizza(Canvas win,
             double startX,
             double startY,
             double pizzaSize,
             java.lang.String crustOption,
             boolean changeBase,
             int number)
        Constructor for pizza.
        Parameters:
        win - the window to draw the pizza on
        startX - the top-left x coordinate for the section of screen to draw pizza on
        startY - the top-left y coordinate for the section of screen to draw pizza on
        pizzaSize - the size of the pizza base
        crustOption - the chosen crust type
        changeBase - if true changes the base sauce to BBQ
        number - the number of the pizza
